languages.text: Жертва ткача Кровавой паутины открыла, что за убийствами каторжан стояло неведомое зло, и погасила пожар мятежа.
The sacrifice of a Bloodspun Web cultist revealed that an unknown evil had caused the convicts' murders, extinguishing the fires of rebellion.
languages.original_text: Жертва ткача Кровавой паутины открыла, что за убийствами каторжан стояло неведомое зло, и погасила пожар мятежа.

traits.locale_text: The sacrifice of a Bloodspun Web weaver revealed that an unknown evil had caused the convicts' murders and extinguished the fires of rebellion.

The sacrifice of a Bloodspun Web cultist revealed that an unknown evil had caused the convicts' murders, extinguishing the fires of rebellion.
The sacrifice of a Bloodspun Web cultist revealed that an unknown evil had caused the convicts' murders, extinguishing the fires of rebellion.

languages.text: Das Opfer eines Kultisten des Blutgesponnenen Netzes hat offenbart, das eine böse Macht den Tod der Sträflinge herbeigeführt und das Feuer der Rebellion erstickt hat.
languages.original_text: The sacrifice of a Bloodspun Web cultist revealed that an unknown evil had caused the convicts' murders, extinguishing the fires of rebellion.

traits.locale_text: Das Opfer eines Kultisten des Blutgesponnenen Netzes hat offenbart, das eine böse Macht den Tod der Sträflinge herbeigeführt und das Feuer der Rebellion erstickt hat.

languages.text: Le sacrifice d'un cultiste de la Toile de Sang a révélé l'existence d'un mal inconnu responsable de la mort des condamnés et a étouffé les flammes de la rébellion.
languages.original_text: The sacrifice of a Bloodspun Web cultist revealed that an unknown evil had caused the convicts' murders, extinguishing the fires of rebellion.

traits.locale_text: Le sacrifice d'un cultiste de la Toile de Sang a révélé l'existence d'un mal inconnu responsable de la mort des condamnés et a étouffé les flammes de la rébellion.

languages.text: El sacrificio de un cultista de la Red Sanguinolenta reveló que una maldad desconocida había causado los asesinatos de los convictos, sofocando la rebelión.
languages.original_text: The sacrifice of a Bloodspun Web cultist revealed that an unknown evil had caused the convicts' murders, extinguishing the fires of rebellion.

traits.locale_text: El sacrificio de un cultista de la Red Sanguinolenta reveló que una maldad desconocida había causado los asesinatos de los convictos, sofocando la rebelión.

languages.text: ブラッドスパン・ウェブの信者が犠牲になったことで、未知の悪が囚人の殺人を引き起こしたことが明らかになり、反乱の火は消火された。
languages.original_text: The sacrifice of a Bloodspun Web cultist revealed that an unknown evil had caused the convicts' murders, extinguishing the fires of rebellion.

traits.locale_text: ブラッドスパン・ウェブの信者が犠牲になったことで、未知の悪が囚人の殺人を引き起こしたことが明らかになり、反乱の火は消火された。

languages.text: 织血罗网牺牲了一位忠实的信徒，揭示出了谋杀行为背后的未知邪恶，扑灭了叛乱的火焰。
languages.original_text: The sacrifice of a Bloodspun Web cultist revealed that an unknown evil had caused the convicts' murders, extinguishing the fires of rebellion.

traits.locale_text: 织血罗网牺牲了一位忠实的信徒，揭示出了谋杀行为背后的未知邪恶，扑灭了叛乱的火焰。

languages.text: Kanipi Ağı'ndan bir tarikatçının fedakârlığı sayesinde mahkûmların katledilmesinden bilinmeyen bir kötülüğün sorumlu olduğu ortaya çıktı ve isyan ateşi söndü.
languages.original_text: The sacrifice of a Bloodspun Web cultist revealed that an unknown evil had caused the convicts' murders, extinguishing the fires of rebellion.
